direction.raw_text: These numbers, are a code. The first number refers to the page of a given book. The second to a specific line on that page. The third number to words on that line. If I didn't have the exact edition of the book, the code would be unbreakable.

direction.raw_text: (nodding, impressed) And what do the numbers refer to?

direction.raw_text: That's where it breaks down -- the words are the Latin names of two plant species... Calochortus Albus... and Umbellularia Californica. Fairy Lantern... and California Bay. Both common flowering plants...

direction.raw_text: Not part of your work? Or Professor Bressler's? Martin shakes his head. Jurgen grunts. Pencils notes...

direction.raw_text: They're both progressives. Fahad knows we'll need food long after oil. New agricultural patents are worth billions... (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: But his progressiveness has cost him... his own people hate him... the attempts on his life...

direction.raw_text: Martin Harris... with just a few guests, in a confined space with Prince Fahad. For some, that might be a very good reason to want to be you.

direction.raw_text: The guard shoves him against the console, starts to cuff his other arm. Martin LURCHES back, both of them tumbling over. Martin scrambles for the door...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin stumbles out into a crush of panicked stragglers, ducks down, lost in the press. Moments after, the guard appears at the door, speaking into his radio...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin B rushes into the room. Stops. Like Pompeii: a party abandoned. Furniture upended. Guests. All gone. Urgently searching for the remote. Down on his hands and knees. Looks at his watch. Pales...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KICKS at the wall. No good. RIPS the heavy cistern lid off the top of the toilet. SMASHES it against the plaster. Dents... dust... beginning to give...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gina and Bressler come out onto the floor with the girls, heading to the bottleneck at the exits...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moving purposefully towards the group, closing, her hand in the unzipped top of the sportsbag slung over her shoulder. Glimpse of an oiled-black Uzi machine pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The other direction. Martin appears, handcuff dangling from one wrist. He SCANS frantic through the bottlenecked crowds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gina and Bressler! Martin starts forward, ducks back as Strauss re-enters, commanding his security.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz closes, tracking, finger flicks off Uzi's safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gina1 Gina!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is moving, pressing through crowds. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gina hears his voice, can't find him through the crowds as next to her Bressler comforts his daughters as BEHIND THEM Liz moves closer, closer... . Suddenly seeing Martin. A decision, sudden SHIFT. Liz passes, brushing Gina lightly as she goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: registering the touch, looks up at the woman walking away from her now recognizing Martin, pressing through the crowd towards her. Gina's face lighting up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pushes by a group of people, closing towards Gina and suddenly Liz is in his arms, grasping him, romantic...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh thank God you're here! Martin stares at her in horror as she beams up at him. One hand caressing his cheek... .her other hand pressing a knife against his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seeing Martin and Liz, embracing. Confused. Alarmed. Hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz still hugging him tight, whispering hard, her free hand sliding something metallic into his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Martin. I just placed a gun in your jacket pocket. One bullet. There's really only one person, one right way to kill Bressler now, isn't there? The crazy man whose been stalking him, the crazy man who pretended to be Martin Harris...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and after you've shot him, point the gun at the Police.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't do it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God you're weak. The 'Martin' I knew wouldn't have been able to go on living like you are. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her eyes duck, purposeful, he tracks her gaze. Sees the Uzi in the sportsbag...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll kill them all. Bressler, the girls... your new girlfriend, and whoever tries to stop me. Look at it this way: I'm giving you a chance to save most of them. You can be the hero... A kiss, sexy. Gina in the background, taking a step back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooops, bet you wish you could explain that. Time's up, Martin. Go finish what you came to Berlin for in the first place. On Martin. Caught. No play. He turns, walks...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin B has a small hole opened up. He can see the digital timer. 00:00:14, 00:00:13... Jams his hand into the hole. Trying to force it past the narrow opening. Desperately feeling for the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin, on a suicide mission. Walks in a daze towards Gina, Bressler beyond. His hand moves into his pocket. Gina, stepping forward...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin...? Martin? He STARES at her. Tears in his eyes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strauss re-enters, commanding his security. STOPS as he recognizes Martin, mouths words to his men...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin B, forcing his arm further. Fingers reach the controls... search for the right one...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .his finger flips a small switch. The timer... STOPS. Martin B sighs, breathes hard. Holy shit that was close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin and Gina, locked, staring. Her face a million questions... No answers. Martin shakes his head, turns away from her, towards Bressler, his hand coming out of his pocket with the gun... In Martin's face: horror, deadly conviction... Time SLOOOWS. Sound AMPLIFIES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Seeing the gun. Shouting! Weapons being drawn!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Also seeing the gun. A hand going out, a scream building...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bringing the Vun up, pointed at Bressler's head, perfect kill shot. No choice. Finger on the trigger...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin B stands, dusts off his coat, starts to walk out of the bathroom... "crunch" he steps on something. A soft "beep." He looks down, REACTS to: The remote control... under his foot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! WHITE OUT BLAST as the bomb DETONATES. Martin B atomized. Sheets of flame bursting through windows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The blast ROCKS the room. People tumble, chandelier falls. KER-ASH!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dives aside as a column SLAMS down near her. SPRINKLERS burst on. Water rains down. Main lights black out... beat, then emergency lights come on. Total CHAOS. Find...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: clutching his DAUGHTERS as SECURITY reaches them, surrounding them, searching for signs of Martin... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dazed, bleeding, picks herself up. Searching the room for Martin... gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOTEL IMPERIAL -_CONTINUOUS Food-laden serving carts, cook-tops, pots and pans, knives. Falling plaster and debris... deserted. Liz walks through, brisk, angry. Dress torn, a cut across her forehead. She stops at a disposal chute, disposes of the sportsbag. Reaches high under her dress, comes out with a knife, starts to toss it as well... .She STOPS. Looks up, into the distorted mirror of the stainless steel surface in front of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Hello, Martin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... to find Martin there. Bleeding, hurt, covered is debris, but holding the gun on her in unsteady hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful, that might go off. She turns to face him. Hair slicked, clothes drenched. Stunning despite everything
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five years as a team... and you end it like this. Her hand almost casually moves back, the knife still seated in her palm. Martin tracks it, steadies the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't. Keep your hands where I can see them. Please...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the hotel structure. Plaster and cables fall,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: across the floor. Martin FLINCHES, tries to keep steady. Liz is steady, cool. Laughs a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, working with you... it almost wasn't work. We were so good... You, were so good. At the job. At other things... She smiles a little, warming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you want to know your real name? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let go of the knife, Liz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Liz?'... Don't you want to know y real name? Don't you still want... me? She leans forward, just a breath. Warmth radiating, Martin stepping back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, just stop, Liz... Her face, reading him. His fear, his uncertainty... She smiles, just a little... Liz throws the knife! Martin FIRES as the blade sinks into him, sending him reeling back onto the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His hand going to the knife sunk in his shoulder, SCREAMING in agony as he rips it out, looking up at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A soft distance in her face. A small hole in her chest, just below her beautiful collar bone. Her eyes find him, focus, smile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll never know. You'll never know who you are... A long beat. We're not sure when exactly the life goes out of her eyes. Finally, Martin pulls himself forward. Gently closes her eyelids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police keeping people back. FIRE TRUCKS everywhere, jets of water fighting back the flames. A collective GASP... as the bomb-damaged corner of the hotel starts to FOLD INWARD in a spray of dust and smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moves through the crowd, anxiously searching the stream of people still pouring from the building... She JUMPS as a hand takes her arm. Turns her. Martin. she stumbles back, hands raised against him. Fear, betrayal, love... Him standing there, empty, bleeding... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gut instinct wins. She takes a step towards him, he pulls her tight to him. Holds on. All he has. All he knows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hotel survivors... Bressler: shaken, oblivious that he's the epicenter and object of the destruction all around him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... BACKGROUND NOISES... Echoing CHIMES of a PA calling platforms... an espresso machine nearby. ON SCREEN, CNN... the Hotel Imperial. Day- after shots of the blown-out 14th floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Less than twenty-four hours after the failed assassination attempt on the Saudi prince... Image switches to Fahad seated in a PRESS CONFERENCE where Bressler is speaking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) . Nobel laureate Professor Leo Bressler announced the development of a new strain of corn... fast growing, self- propagating, drought tolerant and pest resistant... To be made available worldwide without patent or copyright costs... Rapturous applause. Standing ovation...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: applauded the announcement, while the Dow Jones saw agri-business stocks plunge four percent...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the TV... one of several in the central CAFE AREA in...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FINDING two figures nestled among the travelers... Martin and Gina, seated close. The two of them, gentle. Small touches. Getting used to peace...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... Do you know? What you would have done...? He looks back at her, starts to speak. An ANNOUNCEMENT cuts through, their train leaving. They stand, move off... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as we CRANE UP SLOWLY above the crowds streaming along a platform to board an inter-Europe express -- families, business travelers, soldiers on leave... ordinary people... another day in their lives...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) They say your whole life flashes before you... but it's the little things... the details... Gina reaches out, takes Martin's arm. Draws him closer.
direction.name: direction
